name: Systemwide information technology and services special fund
text: There is established a special fund to be known as the systemwide information technology and services special fund, from which all moneys shall be used in support of systemwide information technology and services including personnel, equipment costs, and other expenses, as well as, planning, design, and implementation of information technology infrastructure within the university.  All moneys for the fund shall be provided from revenues collected from users of information technology and services and any information technology user fee established pursuant to section 304-4. [L 1985, c 188, pt of §2; am L 1993, c 280, §42; am L 1995, c 163, §1]
